text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Didn’t see hannity tweeting ANYTHING in support of trump’s genius ideas for people to inject disinfectants and blast their skin with UV rays to attempt to destroy the coronavirus. I guess hannity thought this was crazy as hell too. Silence speaks volume.
